body:
Comment 4: 
Making it possible to use integer constants directly with math/big.Int would probably
require a language change: Some languages permit custom "literal parsers" for that kind
of thing, and we wouldn't want to have a one-off implementation just for integers. Such
a language change would raise all kinds of pretty fundamental questions. The existing Go
is not that kind of language and we are not going to go there anytime soon.

You can always provide a helper function that takes an integer string instead (depending
on how fast this needs to be be).
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
